turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to place an order for pizza from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four large pizzas with thick crust, and then I want two cheese, one pepperoni, and one sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large thick crust pizzas, 2 cheese, 1 pepperoni, and 1 sausage, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep and that's going to be for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you so much.
